enabled.title: Extension enabled status
enabled.description: This controls whether or not extension is activated.

flag.title: Autocomplete Flag
flag.description: This controls whether or not autocomplete is activated.

apiKey.title: API key
apiKey.description: This is the api key to call the endpoints.

autocompleteDomain.title: Autocomplete Domain
autocompleteDomain.description: Used to construct url to call autocomplete endpoint

transformDomain.title: Transfer Domain
transformDomain.description: Used to construct url to call transform endpoint
